Text: Beep BeepThats my own horn but I am proud of this the message is from our new chairman and thought you might be interested Original Message From Pickett Donn Sent Monday October AM To ALL USERS MDBE Subject Our extraordinary firm I thought we could all use some good news The recent American Lawyer associates survey which ranked us as the best law firm in California and ninth best in the country capped off a year of tremendous accolades to McCutchen These honors are the result of our firm values our mutual commitment to each other and a lot of hard work The challenge of the coming year will be not just to maintain these distinctions but to do even better In the meantime I wanted to share these with you because we all should be very proud of ourselves Fortune magazine lists McCutchen as one of The Best Companies to Work for in the US January Ranked as having the largest percentage of female attorneys and the second highest percentage of female equity partners among the top law firms in the country National Law Journal December Ranked one of the Most Diverse Law Firms in America Minority Law Journal December Ranked law firm in California and in the country for commitment to pro bono work American Lawyer August Ranked in California in the country in AmLaws Annual Associates Survey American Lawyer October Vaults Guide to the Top Law Firms ranks McCutchen one of the Most Prestigious Law Firms in the country Winter McCutchens environmental practice is ranked in the top nationwide American Lawyer October McCutchen lawyers defended two of the top ten defense cases in California in Daily Journals Verdicts Settlements April Donn EMAIL NOTICE This email message is for the sole use of the intended recipients and may contain confidential andor privileged information Any review use disclosure or distribution by persons or entities other than the intended recipients is prohibited If you are not the intended recipient please contact the sender by reply and destroy all copies of the original message Thank you To reply to our Email Administrator directly send an email to or call and delete this email McCUTCHEN DOYLE BROWN ENERSEN LLP
